title: The Source
description: I am Seraphine LaLande, VooDoo Priestess! Well, not quite.In order to be a priestess I have to first successfully raise a zombie, make it do my bidding, and then tuck it back in for the eternal dirt nap it was supposed to have to begin with. Of course, being me, things donâ€™t go according to plan. The trouble all started when my zombie ran off into the night...This is a short story, the first in a series of young adult, fantasy short stories entitled, The VooDoo Follies!
author: Christine M. Butler
